definitions.definition: Governed or governing by exact rules; observing exact rules; severe; rigorous.
definitions.example: very strict in observing the Sabbath

definitions.definition: Rigidly interpreted; exactly limited; confined; restricted.
definitions.example: to understand words in a strict sense

definitions.definition: Upright, or straight and narrow; — said of the shape of the plants or their flower clusters.

definitions.example: It was a very strict lesson.

definitions.definition: Irreflexive; if the described object is defined to be reflexive, that condition is overridden and replaced with irreflexive.
